Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: init()
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Creates a new empty snapshot object.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: numberOfItems
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: The number of item identifiers in the snapshot.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: numberOfSections
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: The number of section identifiers in the snapshot.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: sectionIdentifiers
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: All section identifiers in the snapshot.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: itemIdentifiers
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: All item identifiers in the snapshot.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: numberOfItems(inSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Returns the number of item identifiers in the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: itemIdentifiers(inSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Returns the item identifiers in the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: sectionIdentifier(containingItem:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Returns a section identifier containing the specified item.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: indexOfItem(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Returns an index of the specified item.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: indexOfSection(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Returns an index of the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: appendItems(_:toSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Appends the given item identifiers to the specified section or last section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: insertItems(_:beforeItem:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Inserts the given item identifiers before the specified item.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: insertItems(_:afterItem:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Inserts the given item identifiers after the specified item.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: deleteItems(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Deletes the specified items.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: deleteAllItems()
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Deletes the all items in the snapshot.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: moveItem(_:beforeItem:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Moves the given item identifier before the specified item.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: moveItem(_:afterItem:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Moves the given item identifier after the specified item.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: reloadItems(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Reloads the specified items.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: appendSections(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Appends the given section identifiers to the end of sections.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: insertSections(_:beforeSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Inserts the given section identifiers before the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: insertSections(_:afterSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Inserts the given section identifiers after the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: deleteSections(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Deletes the specified sections.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: moveSection(_:beforeSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Moves the given section identifier before the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: moveSection(_:afterSection:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Moves the given section identifier after the specified section.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.name: reloadSections(_:)
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html#.abstract: Reloads the specified sections.

Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html.name: DiffableDataSourceSnapshot
Structs/DiffableDataSourceSnapshot.html.abstract: A class for backporting NSDiffableDataSourceSnapshot introduced in iOS 13.0+, macOS 10.15+, tvOS 13.0+.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: CellProvider
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: The type of closure providing the cell.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: SupplementaryViewProvider
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: The type of closure providing the supplementary view for element of kind.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: supplementaryViewProvider
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: A closure to dequeue the views for element of kind.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: apply(_:animatingDifferences:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Applies given snapshot to perform automatic diffing update.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: snapshot()
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns a new snapshot object of current state.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: itemIdentifier(for:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns an item identifier for given index path.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: indexPath(for:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns an index path for given item identifier.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns the number of sections in the data source.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: collectionView(_:numberOfItemsInSection:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns the number of items in the specified section.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: collectionView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns a cell for item at specified index path.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOfKind:at:)
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: Returns a supplementary view for element of kind at specified index path.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: CellProvider
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: The type of closure providing the cell.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: defaultRowAnimation
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: The default animation to updating the views.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: apply(_:animatingDifferences:)
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Applies given snapshot to perform automatic diffing update.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: snapshot()
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Returns a new snapshot object of current state.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: itemIdentifier(for:)
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Returns an item identifier for given index path.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: indexPath(for:)
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Returns an index path for given item identifier.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Returns the number of sections in the data source.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Returns the number of items in the specified section.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: Returns a cell for row at specified index path.

Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.name: TableViewDiffableDataSource
Classes/TableViewDiffableDataSource.html.abstract: A class for backporting UITableViewDiffableDataSource introduced in iOS 13.0+, tvOS 13.0+.

Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.name: CollectionViewDiffableDataSource
Classes/CollectionViewDiffableDataSource.abstract: A class for backporting UICollectionViewDiffableDataSource introduced in iOS 13.0+, tvOS 13.0+.
